content.raw:
Wouldn't it be better if all child processes get terminated when the zprocess.remote server is terminated \(especially when it is done gracefully\)?

> I should change this to to either error right away or just queue to send later, so that it either be detected right away that the child process is dead \(well, or the network is down\), or so that the error becomes a timeout one instead of a hang.

Sounds good, and if the timeout error is raised, make it crash the tab rather than blacs.
content.html:
Wouldn't it be better if all child processes get terminated when the zprocess.remote server is terminated (especially when it is done gracefully)?

I should change this to to either error right away or just queue to send later, so that it either be detected right away that the child process is dead (well, or the network is down), or so that the error becomes a timeout one instead of a hang.

Sounds good, and if the timeout error is raised, make it crash the tab rather than blacs.
